settings.GIftBox_contant: NgOne Unveiled in our Signature Luxury Box, adorned with a Satin Gold Ribbon.

settings.title: Delivery:
settings.paragraph1: Free Express Shipping to US and Canada

settings.title: 7 Inch display
settings.paragraph: Immerse yourself in stunning visuals on our vibrant 7-inch IPS display, designed for a shared experience with its wide viewing angle.

settings.title: 40 minutes video or 1000 photos
settings.paragraph: Preserve your cherished moments with the capacity to store up to 40 minutes of video or curate a gallery of more than 1000 photos.

settings.title: 2 hours battery
settings.paragraph: Experience your NgOne with up to 2 hours of continuous watching time on a single charge.

settings.title: Sound Speaker
settings.paragraph: Elevate your auditory experience with a built in sound speaker.

settings.title: Media Controls
settings.paragraph: Take control of your NgOne effortlessly with intuitive media control buttons.

settings.title: Automatic Display
settings.paragraph: Experience a touch of magic as the display comes to life the moment you open your NgOne.

settings.title: NgOS
settings.paragraph: An Integrated sleek video player, photo slideshow, and dedicated folders for videos and photos with pre-defined appearance order.

settings.title: What is NgOne and how does it work?
settings.paragraph: NgOne is our innovative digital album designed to showcase your cherished memories. Simply upload your videos and photos using our dedicated app, and the NgOne device will be delivered to you ready to play them, creating a personalized and seamless viewing experience.

settings.title: How can I upload my media to NgOne?
settings.paragraph:
Follow these simple steps:

  1. Connect your NgOne to your computer using the included USB-C cable.
  2. Your computer will recognize a new disk named "Nostalgius." Open it to find two folders: "Video" and "Photo."
  3. Copy your media files to the corresponding folder, ensuring a complete transfer.
  4. Safely disconnect the cable, and you're all set to relive your cherished memories on NgOne.

settings.title: Can I change the media on NgOne after it has been dispatched?
settings.paragraph: Certainly! NgOne is designed for flexibility. Simply connect it to any computer using the provided USB-C cable, and you can easily update or replace your media content whenever you like.

settings.title: How long does it take for NgOne to be delivered after I place an order?
settings.paragraph:
We provide free 2-day Express delivery to the United States.

If you choose to pre-upload media, your order will be placed on hold until you upload and confirm the media. Our team will process it during business hours, and will promptly dispatch it to your designated address.
